title: Trump says he wants government to buy $200B in mortgage bonds in a push to bring down mortgage rates
full_text: Trump says he wants government to buy $200B in mortgage bonds in a push to bring down mortgage rates. President Donald Trump said on social media Thursday that he is directing the federal government to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds, a move he said would ....
